title: API Response Parser
description: Parse a simulated API JSON response string into data objects and handle success/error cases.
instructions: Create a function parseResponse(json) that extracts status and data from a simple key=value formatted response. Handle both success and error responses.

hints.text: Split the response string by commas to get fields
Split each field by '=' to get key-value pairs
Check the status to determine if it's success or error

commonMistakes.correction: Parse by key name, not position
